items.sentence: Lately, I've been letting my English go. It seems I'll never improve at it, no matter how many years I study.
The limo was too long to fit into one parking space, so it was parked diagonally across three parking spaces.
When I first moved here, I couldn't stand the heat and humidity. But I think at this point I've acclimatized.
Imogen of the Internet is fighting six bored housewives to win an eBay auction for a bag of premium chai tea.
Mary is very spiteful and gives Tom the cold shoulder for days after the slightest disagreement between them.
